mapper.select: select q.title, r.*,u.useraccount,u.username,u.avator from reply r,user u,question q where ruid = #{useraccount} and r.useraccount = u.useraccount and r.qid = q.qid and r.tag = 1;
select count(1) nums from reply r where ruid = #{useraccount} and r.tag = 1;
select q.title,r.*,u.avator from reply r, question q,user u where r.qid = q.qid and r.ruid = u.useraccount and r.useraccount = #{useraccount} and r.tag = 1;
select count(1) from reply r, question q where r.qid = q.qid and r.useraccount = #{useraccount} and r.tag = 1;
select pid,title,c.cname from post p , circle c where useraccount = #{useraccount} and p.cid = c.cid and c.tag = 1 and p.tag =1;
select count(1) from post p , circle c where useraccount = #{useraccount} and p.cid = c.cid and c.tag = 1 and p.tag =1;
select c.cname,c.cid from follow f , circle c where f.cid = c.cid and c.tag = 1 and f.useraccount = #{useraccount};
